titles.title: Lord, I Hear of Showers of Blessing

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Lord, I hear of show'rs of blessing, Thou art scatt'ring full and free, Show'rs the thirsty land refreshing; Let some drops now fall on me--

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Even me, even me, Let some drops now fall on me.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: Pass me not, O mighty Spirit! Thou canst make the blind to see; Witnesser of Jesus' merit, Speak the word of pow/r to me.

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: Pass me not! Thy lost one bringing, Bind my heart, O Lord, to Thee; While the streams of life are springing, Blessing others, O bless me.
